tooltip: Select Xana, Queen of the Stray Fairies as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Xana focuses on improving Stray Fairies and summoning them.
Allows you to summon Xana, a large Melee hero that rips apart enemies with her bare hands.
Flying Siege unit that drops spores on its target.
Stray Fairies gain a Bubble Shield, making them very resistant to non-magic damage sources.
Great Butterfly Fairies now spawn twice as many Stray Fairies when slain.
